mxCell.value:
Lightning network (LN)

- Filled nodes collect gossip messages

- A filled node runs a Core-Lightning Plugin that pushes collected gossip messages to the Kafka instance

Kafka

- Distributed event streaming platform

- Providing message pub-sub-infrastructure

Post Processing Service
https://github.com/ln-history/post-processing-service

- Micro-Service to format gossip messages for graph database

- Removal of duplicates

Graph database

- Stores gossip messages in a graph
- Puts every message in time buckets for faster queries
 
- Provides data science functions to analyse the graph at given timestamps

C# .NET backend
https://github.com/ln-history/ln-history

- Exposes the API providing functionality

- Queries the neo4j-database

Clients

- Request ln-history service
